nodes.text: Creatures of KOTOR 1: Firaxa and Gizka

Creatures of KOTOR 1: Firaxa and Gizka was an online supplement for Star Wars Roleplaying Game. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on December 16, 2008 and was the first in the series of web enhancements, which present information on creatures that didn't made it into Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide because of space reasons. This article gave information on the firaxa, a type of shark from Manaan, and the gizka, a small reptile found throughout the galaxy.
